price: Na majini tuliwaumba kabla kwa moto wa upepo umoto.
arabic: وَٱلۡجَآنَّ خَلَقۡنَٰهُ مِن قَبۡلُ مِن نَّارِ ٱلسَّمُومِ
footnotes: Na makhaluku wengine ni majini, ambao tuliwaumba mbele, alipo umbwa asili yake Iblisi kutokana na moto mkali mno unao toka katika tundu za mwili wa mtu.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: wal-jāna khalaqnāhu min qablu min nāri al-samūmi
